notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.
ariaRetry: Retry the task. You can improve your previous answer if the author allowed that.
taskDescription:
Use properties of real numbers and mental math to calculate the following:

9 × 8 × 11 9 \times 8 \times 11
detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>9</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mn>11</mn>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>99</mn>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">9 \times 11 = 99\,</annotation></semantics></math>. Using that, the problem can be changed to <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>99</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mn>8</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">99 \times 8</annotation></semantics></math>. Change to <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>99</mn>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mn>100</mn>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>1</mn>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">99 = (100 - 1)</annotation></semantics></math>. Using the distributive property, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>99</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mn>8</mn>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mn>100</mn>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>1</mn>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mn>8</mn>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>100</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mn>8</mn>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>1</mn>
  <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
  <mn>8</mn>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>800</mn>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>8</mn>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>792</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">99 \times 8 = (100 - 1) \times 8 = 100 \times 8 - 1 \times 8 = 800 - 8 = 792</annotation></semantics></math>.
